title: The true cost of wood-burning stoves
description: Learning the full extent of the environmental damage caused by wood-burning stoves led Guardian columnist George Monbiot to issue a public mea culpa – and help ignite a raging debate. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: The true cost of wood-burning stoves
creator: The Guardian
